meanings.sent1: She is always unpunctual for our meetings.
meanings.sent2: The unpunctual bus made her late for school.
meanings.sent3: His unpunctual arrival at the party caused some laughter among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The unpunctual train was like a slow-moving turtle on the tracks.
meanings.sent5: The unpunctual student missed the entire lecture.

meanings.sent1: The unpunctual delivery of the package annoyed the customer.
meanings.sent2: Her unpunctual response to emails often caused misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The unpunctual clock seemed to have a mind of its own, always running behind.
meanings.sent4: The unpunctual progress of the project was like watching a snail race.
meanings.sent5: The unpunctual train departure left many passengers frustrated.
